content:
Low-level functionalities for "Image/Content Discovery":

1. Keyword search: Users can search for images using keywords related to their interests.
2. Hashtag search: Users can search for images using hashtags.
3. Categories: Users can browse images by categories such as fashion, food, travel, etc.
4. Trending: Users can see trending images and topics.
5. Related images: Users can see images related to their current search.
6. Filtering: Users can filter their search results by date, popularity, etc.
7. Infinite Scrolling: Users can continuously scroll to see more images.
8. Lightbox view: Users can view images in a lightbox mode, with the ability to zoom in and out.
9. Save image: Users can save images to their boards for future reference.
10. Share image: Users can share images on social media or via direct links.
